name: Amulet of the Dragon-kin
data: It increases the users strength somewhat.
It increases the users dexterity somewhat.
It increases the users constitution somewhat.
It has magnificent armour class for its type (little in general).
It decreases the users spellpoint regeneration like a god.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration impressively.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'riposte'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'attack'.
This item loses its magical powers somewhat faster than avarage.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'whirlwind attack'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'parry'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'dodge'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'doublehit'.
